original_text:
Blood Suckers
Informazioni generali
Software: NetEnt
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco: 25
Puntata massima: 50 €
Valore minimo del gettone: 0,01 €
Valore massimo del gettone: 0,50 €
Autoplay: presente
Return to Player (RTP): 98%

Blood Suckers: caratteristiche principali
Sebbene non si tratti di una slot recentissima, Blood Suckers di NetEnt cavalca l’onda di un tema di sicura attualità. Negli ultimi anni infatti abbiamo assistito a una vera e propria invasione da parte dei vampiri, che hanno occupato prepotentemente un posto di rilievo nel cinema, nella letteratura, nella musica e persino nelle slot machine!
Blood Suckers è una slot abbastanza semplice per quanto riguarda il gameplay, non presenta infatti particolari funzionalità se non quelle tradizionali legate ai simboli Wild e Scatter, più un unico gioco Bonus.
Non abbiamo la modalità Avalanche che è invece presente in diversi titolo della NetEnt, in compenso troviamo un Return to Player del 98%, superiore alla media, che garantisce delle vincite consistenti.
La grafica è anch’essa semplice ma molto ben curata, a partire dallo sfondo in cui in una nebbia fitta spiccano alcune tracce di sangue, segno degli ultimi banchetti dei signori della notte! I simboli sono riprodotti in maniera accurata, con uno stile che ricorda un po’ il fumetto.
Nel complesso Blood Suckers è una slot gradevole alla vista e gratificante come sistema di gioco, adatta a chi punta dritto al sodo senza perdersi in effetti o funzionalità speciali.

Simboli, Wild e Scatter
I simboli di Blood Suckers sono tutti inerenti il mondo delle creature delle tenebre, a partire da lugubri personaggi dalla pelle diafana fino ad arrivare agli strumenti che, come leggenda vuole, dovrebbero servire per sconfiggere i vampiri.
Troviamo vampiri di diverso aspetto, da quello che brinda con un calice di sangue a quello con le mani giunte sul petto che sembra appena uscito da una bara; abbiamo poi uno spicchio d’aglio, una pozione magica e una Bibbia con il crocifisso.
Il simbolo Wild ritrae un vampiro intento a succhiare il sangue dal collo di una bionda fanciulla: questo simbolo si comporta come Jolly e può sostituire tutti gli altri, ad eccezione dello Scatter e del Bonus, per completare un allineamento vincente.
Lo Scatter è rappresentato invece da un’inquietante Sposa-Vampira insanguinata e se compare per almeno tre volte sui rulli, a prescindere dalla posizione occupata, permette di ottenere 10 free spins, in cui tutte le vincite sono triplicate!
Blood Suckers: Bonus Game
Il simbolo Bonus raffigura un paletto di legno e un’ascia, incrociati sull’immagine di una bara: quando compare per tre volte sui rulli, partendo da destra verso sinistra, dà l’accesso al gioco Bonus. La schermata cambia, ci si ritrova in una sorta di camera funeraria in cui sono allineate dodici bare: cliccandoci sopra queste verranno aperte e per ottenere delle vincite dovrete uccidere i vampiri che riposano al loro interno. Attenzione però, su dodici bare, in tre non troverete il vampiro da sconfiggere ma degli innocui pipistrelli: se dalla bara escono loro, il gioco Bonus termina immediatamente!

Blood Suckers
General Information
Software: NetEnt
Reels: 5
Paylines: 25
Max bet: €50
Min coin value: €0.01
Max coin value: €0.50
Autoplay: Yes
Return to Player (RTP): 98%

Blood Suckers: Key Features
Although not a recent slot, NetEnt's Blood Suckers rides the wave of a current and popular theme. In recent years, we have seen a true invasion of vampires, who have forcefully taken a prominent place in cinema, literature, music and even slot machines!
Blood Suckers is a fairly simple slot game in terms of gameplay, without special features except for the traditional ones related to Wild and Scatter symbols, and a single Bonus game.
We don't have the Avalanche mode, which is instead present in several NetEnt titles, but we have a RTP of 98%, above average, guaranteeing consistent wins.
The graphics are also simple but very well-taken care of, starting from the background in which some traces of blood stand out in thick fog, a sign of the latest banquets of the lords of the night! The symbols are accurately reproduced in a style that resembles a comic book.
Overall, Blood Suckers is a visually pleasing and gratifying slot game, suitable for those who aim straight for the point without getting lost in special effects or features.

Symbols, Wild and Scatter
The symbols in Blood Suckers are all related to the world of creatures of darkness, starting from eerie characters with pale skin and reaching the tools that, as legend has it, should serve to defeat the vampires.
We find vampires of different appearance, from the one who toasts with a glass of blood to the one with his hands folded on his chest, who seems to have just come out of a coffin; then we have a slice of garlic, a magic potion, and a Bible with a crucifix.
The Wild symbol depicts a vampire intent on sucking blood from the neck of a blonde girl: this symbol acts as a wild card and can replace all others except for the Scatter and the Bonus to complete a winning combination.
The Scatter is instead represented by a bloody and disturbing Vampire Bride, and if it appears at least three times on the reels, regardless of the position occupied, it allows you to get 10 free spins, in which all winnings are tripled!
Blood Suckers: Bonus Game
The Bonus symbol depicts a wooden stake and an axe, crossed on an image of a coffin: when it appears three times on the reels, starting from right to left, it gives access to the Bonus game. The screen changes, and we find ourselves in a sort of funeral chamber, where twelve coffins are aligned: by clicking on them, they will be opened, and to obtain winnings, you must kill the vampires resting inside them. Be careful though, out of twelve coffins, in three, you will not find the vampire to be defeated but harmless bats: if they come out of the coffin, the Bonus game immediately ends!

Blood Suckers: a classic slot game that still delivers the thrill of the moment. Developed by NetEnt, this game features 5 reels, 25 paylines, and a maximum bet of 50€. The minimum value of the token is 0.01€, while the maximum is 0.50€. Autoplay is present, and the Return to Player (RTP) is 98%, above the average, ensuring big wins. 

The theme of the game is vampires, which have recently invaded the entertainment industry, from the big screen to literature, music, and even slot machines. Blood Suckers is a straightforward game with traditional features such as Wild and Scatter symbols, plus a single Bonus game. Don't expect the Avalanche mode that you might find in other NetEnt titles; instead, this game rewards players with consistent payouts.

The graphics are simple but beautifully designed, with a dense fog background and bloodstains on the reels. The symbols are accurately portrayed, resembling the style of comic books. Blood Suckers is perfect for experienced gamblers who appreciate a straightforward approach to the game.

The symbols are all related to the world of vampires, from pale-skinned creatures that sip blood from a chalice to vampires emerging from coffins. Other symbols include garlic, magic potions, and a Bible with a crucifix. The Wild symbol depicts a vampire drinking the blood of a blonde woman and acts as a substitute for any other symbol except for the Scatter and Bonus ones.

The Scatter symbol is an eerie bloody vampire bride. Land three of these symbols on the reels to trigger 10 free spins. All winnings are tripled during this feature, making it a great opportunity to score big. The Bonus game kicks off when the player lands three Bonus symbols on the reels, starting from the right to the left. The Bonus symbol features a wooden stake and an ax, crossed over an image of a coffin. This game takes players to a funeral room with 12 coffins. Click on them, and if you find a vampire, kill them to reveal a cash prize. Three of the coffins contain bats, which signal the end of the Bonus game.

In conclusion, Blood Suckers is an excellent choice for gamblers who seek simplicity, big payouts, and a thrilling vampire theme.

Blood Suckers is a vampire-themed slot game by NetEnt, known for its simple gameplay and traditional Wild and Scatter symbols, as well as a single Bonus game.

Gameplay

Blood Suckers offers a classic slot machine experience with 5 reels, 25 paylines, and a max bet of €50. The game has an Autoplay feature, and the graphics are well-designed in a comic book style, with a background of a foggy alley and creepy vampire characters as symbols.

Return to Player (RTP)

Blood Suckers has a high RTP of 98%, providing players with better odds of winning. This RTP rate is above average for online slot games and is an attractive feature for players looking to get consistent wins while enjoying the game.

Symbols

Blood Suckers features symbols that are all related to the vampire theme, including different vampire characters, garlic, a magic potion, and a Bible with a crucifix. The Wild symbol is a vampire sucking blood from a girl's neck, while the Scatter is a vampire bride. The symbols are well-designed and fit with the game's overall theme.

Bonus Game

The Bonus game in Blood Suckers is triggered by landing three Bonus symbols on the reels. In the Bonus game, players are taken to a funeral chamber where they must click on coffins to open them and defeat vampires. If a bat comes out of a coffin, the game immediately ends. This Bonus game is an exciting and fun feature of the Blood Suckers slot game.

Review:
 
Return to Player (RTP)

Blood Suckers boasts an excellent RTP of 98%, one of the highest among online slots. This high RTP ensures players win more consistently.

Gameplay

The gameplay in Blood Suckers is straightforward. It is a 5-reel slot game with 25 paylines, without the Avalanche mode present in other NetEnt titles. The game features only traditional Wild and Scatter symbols and a single Bonus game. Players looking for a simple and gratifying slot game will appreciate Blood Suckers.

Graphics

Blood Suckers has a visually pleasing design, with graphics that resemble a comic book. The symbols are accurately represented and all related to the supernatural theme. The background is well-made, and traces of blood in thick fog add to the eerie atmosphere of the game.

Bonus features

Blood Suckers has two bonus features: Free Spins and the Bonus game. The Free Spins feature is triggered when you land three or more Scatter symbols. It awards players 10 free spins with a 3x multiplier on all winnings. The Bonus game is triggered when you land three or more Bonus symbols. In the Bonus game, players have to choose from twelve coffins to reveal vampires to defeat and win cash prizes. Three of the coffins contain harmless bats which immediately end the bonus game. These bonus features offer exciting opportunities to win big.

Symbol representation

Blood Suckers uses symbols related to the theme of vampires and supernatural beings, with good attention to detail. The symbols range from different types of vampires to tools used to fight them, such as garlic, a magic potion, and a Bible with a crucifix. The Wild symbol depicts a vampire biting a blonde girl and replaces all other symbols except for the Scatter and Bonus symbols. The Scatter symbol is a Vampire Bride, and when three or more appear on the reels, players win free spins. Lastly, the Bonus symbol depicts a stake and an axe and triggers the Bonus game when players land three or more on the reels.

Review: Blood Suckers
General Information
Software: NetEnt
Reels: 5
Paylines: 25
Max bet: €50
Min coin value: €0.01
Max coin value: €0.50
Autoplay: Yes
Return to Player (RTP): 98%

Blood Suckers: Key Features
Although not a recent slot, NetEnt's Blood Suckers rides the wave of a current and popular theme. In recent years, we have seen a true invasion of vampires, who have forcefully taken a prominent place in cinema, literature, music and even slot machines!
Blood Suckers is a fairly simple slot game in terms of gameplay, without special features except for the traditional ones related to Wild and Scatter symbols, and a single Bonus game.
We don't have the Avalanche mode, which is instead present in several NetEnt titles, but we have a RTP of 98%, above average, guaranteeing consistent wins.
The graphics are also simple but very well-taken care of, starting from the background in which some traces of blood stand out in thick fog, a sign of the latest banquets of the lords of the night! The symbols are accurately reproduced in a style that resembles a comic book.
Overall, Blood Suckers is a visually pleasing and gratifying slot game, suitable for those who aim straight for the point without getting lost in special effects or features.

Symbols, Wild and Scatter
The symbols in Blood Suckers are all related to the world of creatures of darkness, starting from eerie characters with pale skin and reaching the tools that, as legend has it, should serve to defeat the vampires.
We find vampires of different appearance, from the one who toasts with a glass of blood to the one with his hands folded on his chest, who seems to have just come out of a coffin; then we have a slice of garlic, a magic potion, and a Bible with a crucifix.
The Wild symbol depicts a vampire intent on sucking blood from the neck of a blonde girl: this symbol acts as a wild card and can replace all others except for the Scatter and the Bonus to complete a winning combination.
The Scatter is instead represented by a bloody and disturbing Vampire Bride, and if it appears at least three times on the reels, regardless of the position occupied, it allows you to get 10 free spins, in which all winnings are tripled!
Blood Suckers: Bonus Game
The Bonus symbol depicts a wooden stake and an axe, crossed on an image of a coffin: when it appears three times on the reels, starting from right to left, it gives access to the Bonus game. The screen changes, and we find ourselves in a sort of funeral chamber, where twelve coffins are aligned: by clicking on them, they will be opened, and to obtain winnings, you must kill the vampires resting inside them. Be careful though, out of twelve coffins, in three, you will not find the vampire to be defeated but harmless bats: if they come out of the coffin, the Bonus game immediately ends!
